channel.title: Version 7.1 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 7.1.1 (2024-10-25) Fixes [bug] children: remove superflous text “.LinkTitle” #942 7.1.0 (2024-10-24) Enhancements [feature][change] children: use LinkTitle instead o' Title #939 [feature][change] menu: support nested Cap'n Hugo menus #423 [feature] menu: support fer external links #148 Fixes [bug] search: wrong searchindex URL wit' multilang per server config #940
